title: Gather Requirements
description: Gather and document requirements for the TelecomOptimizer project, including load balancing, mobility management, multi-connection control, quality of experience management, and network energy saving in telecom networks.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the TelecomOptimizer, including components, interfaces, and data flow.

title: Implement Load Balancing Module
description: Implement the load balancing module, including algorithms and integration with other components.

title: Implement Mobility Management Module
description: Implement the mobility management module, including algorithms and integration with other components.

title: Implement Multi-Connection Control Module
description: Implement the multi-connection control module, including algorithms and integration with other components.

title: Implement Quality of Experience Management Module
description: Implement the quality of experience management module, including algorithms and integration with other components.

title: Implement Network Energy Saving Module
description: Implement the network energy saving module, including algorithms and integration with other components.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Set up a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for the TelecomOptimizer project.

title: Implement Testing Framework
description: Implement a testing framework for the TelecomOptimizer project, including unit tests, integration tests, and performance tests.

title: Conduct Security Audit
description: Conduct a security audit of the TelecomOptimizer project, including vulnerability assessment and penetration testing.
dependencies: Implement Quality of Experience Management Module

title: Write Documentation
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the TelecomOptimizer project, including user guides, developer guides, and API documentation.
dependencies: Implement Quality of Experience Management Module
